dimensions.name: Decision Making Style
dimensions.description: How you approach making decisions and solving problems

dimensions.name: Work Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How you prefer to work with others and handle leadership

phrases: I prefer detailed plans and schedules
I like structured approaches to tasks
I value predictable routines and processes
I work best with clear procedures
I plan thoroughly before taking action
I prefer systematic step-by-step methods
I prefer flexibility and spontaneity
I adapt quickly as situations change
I embrace unexpected developments
I work well with ambiguous situations
I adjust my approach based on circumstances
I thrive when improvising solutions
I like to take charge in group situations
I naturally assume leadership roles
I make decisions independently
I prefer to work autonomously
I take initiative without being asked
I guide others toward solutions
I prefer collaborative decision-making
I value consensus building in teams
I seek input from others before deciding
I thrive in team environments
I enjoy group problem-solving
I build on others' ideas effectively

quadrant1.name: Adaptive Collaborator
quadrant1.description: You have a flexible approach with strong collaborative teamwork skills. You thrive in dynamic environments and excel at bringing people together to achieve common goals.

quadrant2.name: Structured Collaborator
quadrant2.description: You combine careful planning with collaborative teamwork. You excel at organizing group efforts and ensuring everyone is aligned with clear processes and goals.

quadrant3.name: Structured Leader
quadrant3.description: You prefer planned approaches with individual leadership. You excel at creating clear strategies, making decisive choices, and driving results through systematic execution.

quadrant4.name: Adaptive Leader
quadrant4.description: You combine flexible approaches with individual leadership. You excel at navigating uncertainty, making quick decisions, and inspiring others through dynamic problem-solving.

borderNorth.name: Collaborative Bridge-Builder
borderNorth.description: You balance structured and adaptive approaches while maintaining a strong collaborative focus. You excel at building consensus between different working styles and facilitating team harmony.

borderSouth.name: Independent Strategist
borderSouth.description: You balance structured and adaptive approaches with a preference for individual leadership. You excel at developing flexible strategies and executing them with personal accountability.

borderWest.name: Systematic Facilitator
borderWest.description: You prefer structured approaches while balancing individual and collaborative tendencies. You excel at creating organized frameworks that work for both teams and independent contributors.

borderEast.name: Agile Catalyst
borderEast.description: You prefer adaptive approaches while balancing individual and collaborative tendencies. You excel at energizing both team efforts and independent initiatives through flexible, responsive leadership.

center.name: Dynamic Integrator
center.description: You demonstrate exceptional balance across all working styles. You excel at adapting your approach based on situational needs, seamlessly switching between structure and flexibility, individual and collaborative modes.

homePage.title: Kinetic Style Assessment
homePage.subtitle: Discover your working style and behavioral preferences through our comprehensive assessment tool.
homePage.footer: Your privacy is important to us. All assessment data is securely processed and stored.

assessment.title: Kinetic Style Assessment

partIntros.part1: For each pair below, select the statement that better describes your approach to making decisions and solving problems.
partIntros.part2: For each pair below, select the statement that better describes how you prefer to work with others and handle leadership.

assessment.instructions: Use the slider or click the bars above to select your response

metadata.description: Two-dimensional kinetic style assessment with 4 focused categories
